DIALOG.SPEAKER: CREATURE
DIALOG.TEXT: Where do you think you're[delay 2] goin'?!?[delay 6] [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: CREATURE
DIALOG.TEXT: Where do you think you're[delay 2] goin'?!?[delay 6] [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: CREATURE
DIALOG.TEXT: Where do you think you're[delay 2] goin'?!?[delay 6] [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: I have no idea![halt][br]I was just [player dialog_meet_evan] when I somehow got teleported here... [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: EVAN
DIALOG.TEXT: Go find other brahs and we'll get a party going.[halt]Away! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: W[delay 2]T[delay 2]F[delay 2] is going on![halt] .[delay 2].[delay 2].[delay 2]I guess there are others here.[delay 4] Maybe they'll have some answers... [end]
...A mysterious voice whispers to you from the darkness... [end]
"Press the X button to close or cancel, and the SHIFT button to display the menu..."[end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: FISH
DIALOG.TEXT: YES IT IS I.[delay 5] FISH![delay 3] The one and only. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Um,[delay 4] a pleasure?[delay 5] Do you know where I am? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Ok,[delay 4] got it.[delay 5] But my question...[end_int]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: FISH
DIALOG.TEXT: FISH KNOWS.[delay 6] You are in the domain of Fish, which is a subdomain of Computer. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: FISH
DIALOG.TEXT: Actually,[delay 4] to be more precise,[delay 5] the domain of Fish is this aquatic container. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Yes sir.[delay 6][br]So this is the domain of.[delay 3].[delay 3].[delay 3]a computer? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: FISH
DIALOG.TEXT: Yes,[delay 6] he is a tyrant.[delay 5] He violates my borders and enters my domain repeatedly,[delay 8] if you know what I mean. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: FISH
DIALOG.TEXT: His visa has been revoked,[delay 7] and yet he sneaks in[delay 2] and out[delay 2] and in[delay 2] and out[delay 2] and in and out... [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: How evil![delay 7] Are there any other domains? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: FISH
DIALOG.TEXT: Why yes,[delay 6] there are the domains of [list_players]. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Ok,[delay 5] thanks for the info.[halt] I'll be off to find the others,[delay 3] then-[end_int]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: FISH
DIALOG.TEXT: And I shall accompany you,[delay 5] for it is[br]dangerous,[delay 5] and I wish to aid your quest. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: FISH
DIALOG.TEXT: FUCK YOU.[delay 7][br]I AM FISH.[delay 7][br]I AM COMING. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Check this out. How about those reds, that specular on the intestines there, the texture of the exposed fat. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: ANDY
DIALOG.TEXT: That's sweetdiculous![delay 8] Fuck sketching, let's eviscerate some flesh! WE'LL MAKE GORE HOLES! FOR OUR DICKS! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: ANDY
DIALOG.TEXT: K,[delay 6] I'll see you later then. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Andy![delay 7] Thank god you're all right! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: I've been searching far and wide for you![halt] I need your help to assult the castle and free ourselves from this place. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: ANDY
DIALOG.TEXT: Naw,[delay 7] just brutal doodling another guthook. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Oh,[delay 6] well drop that pen and lets go fuck some shit up! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: ANDY
DIALOG.TEXT: Maybe I'll catch up to you later.[delay 7] I just wanna keep drawing these gore dicks.[delay 6] Feelin' the productivity itch, na wa I mean? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Ugh. Slaying bad dudes is productive too! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: ANDY
DIALOG.TEXT: Yeah[delay 6] probably, I just wanna make some cool art shit. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Fine, I'll show you murder can be artful! [end]
You cover the paper in the blood and guts of the enemy! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: ...and we'll just move these intestines over here, put another eyeball up there.... [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Perfect! Let's just hope Andy agrees. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Ok,[delay 6] thanks for following me,[delay 4] Green. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: So Asa[delay 7], pretty crazy Burning Man this year, eh![halt] What'd ya' think of the Burning Of The Man? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: ASA
DIALOG.TEXT: I really want to go to Burning Man[delay 6] but I can't find it! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Well I'll help you[delay 4] after we go defeat the evil Computer overlord! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: ASA
DIALOG.TEXT: NO![delay 7] I'm a Burner![delay 6] I wanna see the Burning Man! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Ok,[delay 5] I'll find you a Burning Man. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Say,[delay 4] what's the deal with your surname? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: GREEN
DIALOG.TEXT: Oh,[delay 3] in the old world,[delay 3] my family lived in treehouses. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: GREEN
DIALOG.TEXT: They would actually stay warm in the winter by coating themselves in tree sap and leaves to lock in the heat. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: So,[delay 4] would you say that you can get pretty hot? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Oh hey Green...[halt] How'd you get in here? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: GREEN
DIALOG.TEXT: Well, I was sitting at my computer and I had Starcraft on one monitor and anime on the other one and I think maybe the nerd force of them combi-[end_int]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Yeah I think I've heard enough. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: We did it![halt] The Master Brain Slug is dead![halt] You're FREE!!! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Oh...[halt]Shit...Maybe I need to hit it harder? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Jason![halt] That's great![halt] Welcome back buddy![halt] Let's go kick some butt. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Patience![halt] We'll handle that brain boss soon. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: You're not looking so good...[halt] Is that a brain slug you've got there, buddy? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Hmm,[delay 4] why don't I just try and remove that thing for ya? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: We did it![halt] The Master Brain Slug is dead![halt] You're FREE!!! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Oh...[halt]Shit...Maybe I need to hit it harder? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Jason![halt] That's great![halt] Welcome back buddy![halt] Let's go kick some butt. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Patience![halt] We'll handle that brain boss soon. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: You want to go beat some dudes up? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: I better find your cyborg parts... [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Hmm, I wonder if there's anything around here that has batteries in it... [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: MEGAN
DIALOG.TEXT: I can't hear you.[delay 7] Batteries dead. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: !!![halt][br]I'll go find you some new cyborg parts! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Cool,[delay 3] a toy robot! This thing oughta have some batteries in it... [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Score, a DVD player! DVD remotes are prime battery-pickin' territory. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: This crane game is plugged into the wall. No batteries here! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: "Cutesy Classics Jukebox." This thing's definitely plugged into the wall. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: What's a mummy doing in here anyway? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Aw man, someone already took the batteries out of these little cars! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Ooh, a little UFO. This guy's gotta have a few extra-terrestrial batteries in there. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Now that the bunnies are safe,[delay 7] would you join us on a quest to make this world safe for all cute things? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: RACHEL
DIALOG.TEXT: Oh hello [name],[delay 6] have you seen my five bunnies?[halt] They've gotten out and I'm so worried! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Oh no![halt] I haven't seen them,[delay 4] but I swear that they shall be found! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: RON
DIALOG.TEXT: C'mon,[delay 6] let's play some Star Cra[delay 2]a[delay 2]a[delay 2]a[delay 2]a[delay 1]a[delay 1]ft! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: RON
DIALOG.TEXT: Man,[delay 6] you've got some skills,[delay 4] that's for sure.[halt] Fine,[delay 5] I gues I'll join your little computer quest. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: RON
DIALOG.TEXT: Whoa,[delay 5] hey [name]. I'm just puttin' the finishing touches on this here space marine suit. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: RON
DIALOG.TEXT: It should really[delay 1] help me step up my Starcraft game! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Wait,[delay 8] how long have you been in here working on that thing?! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: RON
DIALOG.TEXT: Oh,[delay 5] you know,[delay 6] like an hour or so. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Well[delay 2].[delay 2].[delay 2].[delay 4]how about joining us and getting out of here? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Uh,[delay 6] I think this is a bit more urgent. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: RON
DIALOG.TEXT: C'mon,[delay 6] you know you wanna play some Star Cra[delay 2]a[delay 2]a[delay 2]a[delay 2]a[delay 1]aft! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: RON
DIALOG.TEXT: Man,[delay 6] you've got some skills,[delay 4] that's for sure.[halt] Fine,[delay 5] I gues I'll join your little computer quest. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: RON
DIALOG.TEXT: Oh,[delay 5] you'll be back.[halt] They always come crawling back... [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: I think Ron's halloween costume was better... [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: RALPH
DIALOG.TEXT: Thanks so much![halt] You shall be justly credited. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: So,[delay 4] you doing anything?[halt] Wanna come overthrow some evil? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: RALPH
DIALOG.TEXT: Well,[delay 5] honestly [name],[delay 6] things could be better. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: RALPH
DIALOG.TEXT: I just finished shooting Grim Reaper Park Ranger. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: RALPH
DIALOG.TEXT: I need to get it developed.[halt] Everything hangs on this. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Omigosh.[delay 3] Exciting![delay 6] I'll definitely go get it mailed for development! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Well, it looks like we've got everybody![halt] Let's go take down the Computer! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: COMPUTER
DIALOG.TEXT: So,[delay 5] you've made it.[halt] You all have impressed me greatly, but you must leave. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: COMPUTER
DIALOG.TEXT: Your place is out there,[delay 5] creating monuments in my image. [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: We aren't your slave, Computer![halt] AND WE SHALL BE FREE! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: COMPUTER
DIALOG.TEXT: Impudent fools! Without me,[delay 6] you're nothing!! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: EVAN
DIALOG.TEXT: Looks like we got a party ova' hea'! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Evan?[halt] What are you doing here? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: EVAN
DIALOG.TEXT: *burp* Woooo![delay 5] Partyin'![halt] You brought all my frieeendsss! LET'S GET FUCKED UP! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: Uh,[delay 6] OK,[delay 6] but how about after we finish this villian over here first? [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: EVAN
DIALOG.TEXT: What?![halt] No man,[delay 4] I can't let you do that.[halt] Computer is our master! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: EVAN
DIALOG.TEXT: You can't leave. We need you all.[halt] To make stuff together![halt] And laser dance party together! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: EVAN
DIALOG.TEXT: FINE THEN![halt] COME AT ME BRO! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: DARK EVAN
DIALOG.TEXT: NOOOO!!![halt] THEN YOU SHALL DIE TOO! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: EVAN
DIALOG.TEXT: No,[delay 6] we need to use our secret weapon! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: EVAN
DIALOG.TEXT: JEREMY, I RELEASE YOU FROM YOUR FISH FORM! JOIN US! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: JEREMY
DIALOG.TEXT: No![halt][delay 9] THE POWER OF FRIENDSHIP IS! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: EVERYONE
DIALOG.TEXT: With our powers combined, WE WILL FUCK YOU UP! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: HYBRID
DIALOG.TEXT: WE ARE THE ALPHA AND THE OMEGA! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: HYBRID
DIALOG.TEXT: Sweet,[delay 6] now I have a boob! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: HYBRID
DIALOG.TEXT: WTF! NOW I HAVE A DICK! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: DARK EVAN
DIALOG.TEXT: I'll shut you up for good! [end]

DIALOG.SPEAKER: PLAYER
DIALOG.TEXT: .[delay 3].[delay 3].[delay 3]Does this place even have a postal service? [end]
A weird thing blocks your path![halt] You feel compelled to turn away. [end]
